title.en: Track of the Stars, the Way Throughout the Sky

altTitles.en: Star Trail is the Sky's Road
Track of the Stars, the Way Throughout the Sky
Xing Gui Shi Tian Kong De Dao Lu

description.en:
Kaphisilia Ailide is the daughter of a noble duke. Ever since the disappearance of her elder brother, her parents have put all their pressure on her. Everyday she has to have sword fighting and etiquette class. Days before her father's birthday, she went to a forest of her family's confer territory to get him a present. All of the sudden a death wolf leaped out and tried to kill her. And then this strange guy…  
  
From CHRY and Feng Xi Shen Lei, originally published in Manyou magazine. Track of the Stars, the Way Throughout the Sky tells the story of Kaphisilia Ailide, the daughter of a noble duke who struggles under the weight of her family's expectations. After meeting with a mysterious young man, Lincoln, Kaphisilia escapes from the oppression of her family and embarks on an adventure under a new identity.
